Package watson

Class MasterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • watson.MasterController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OwnerContactsController, OwnerGroupsController, OwnerSecureController, OwnerUsersController, UserContactsController, UserGroupsController

    public class MasterController
extends Object
    Master Controller class which provides global variables and methods for the other Controllers to access and use.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        protected static String get​(TextField field)
        Extracts the String value of a TextField or PasswordField.
        Parameters:
        field - TextField or PasswordField which should be converted to a String
        Returns:
        the String contents of the given TextField or PasswordField, or null if field is null

      • refreshApp

        protected static boolean refreshApp​(String fxml,
                                    String title)
        Attempts to refresh the GUI, loading the FXML page specified.

        If title is null, the window title will not be changed. To remove / clear the window title, set title = "".

        Parameters:
        fxml - *.fxml page to open
        title - title to set in the menubar at the top of the app
        Returns:
        true if the specified page was successfully loaded

      • refreshApp

        protected static boolean refreshApp​(String fxml)
        Calls refreshApp(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) with title = null.
        Parameters:
        fxml - *.fxml page to open
        Returns:
        true if the specified page was successfully loaded
